title: 选择一个文档问题
contents:
mode_edit

选择一个文档问题link

Select a documentation issuelink

本主题介绍如何选择要修复的 Angular 文档问题。

This topic describes how to select an Angular documentation issue to fix.

Angular 文档问题存储在angular/angular存储库的问题选项卡中。文档问题可以通过 comp: docs 标签来识别，并按优先级标记。

Angular documentation issues are stored in the Issues tab of the angular/angular repo. Documentation issues can be identified by the comp: docs label and they are labeled by priority.

欢迎你处理其他人尚未解决的任何问题。如果你知道文档中存在尚未报告的问题，你还可以创建一个新的文档问题。

You are welcome to work on any issue that someone else isn't already working on. If you know of a problem in the documentation that hasn't been reported, you can also create a new documentation issue.

选择要解决的问题时要考虑的一些事项包括：

Some things to consider when choosing an issue to fix include:

  • 解决更高优先级的问题对社区更有价值。

    Fixing higher priority issues is more valuable to the community.

  • 如果你是开源软件的新手，优先级较低的问题或 good first issue 将是一个很好的起点。

    If you're new to open source software, a lower priority issue or a good first issue would be a good place to start.

  • 每一项贡献都有助于改进文档。

    Every contribution helps improve the documentation.

选择要解决的问题后：

After you select an issue to resolve:

  1. 在问题页面中，将 working on fix 添加为注释，以让其他人知道你正在处理它。

    In the issue page, add working on fix as a comment to let others know that you are working on it.

  2. 继续到开始编辑文档主题。

    Continue to Starting to edit a documentation topic.

文档问题的链接Links to documentation issues
[所有打开的文档问题]( https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22 )[All open documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22)
[所有打开的和未分配的文档问题]( https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22+no%3Aassignee+-label %3A"state%3A+has+PR")[All open and unassigned documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配的好第一个文档问题]( https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22+label%3A%22good+ first+issue%22+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned good first documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")

[未分配的优先级 3 文档问题]( https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap3+no% 3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned priority 3 documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22comp%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap3+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
